compassHelp: Another view for navigation showing a compass.
searchHelp: Opens a modal that let you search for a specific building.
itineraryHelp: Shows text itinerary as a list of directions points to follow.
description: LLN Maps purpose is to help you find your way in Louvain-la-Neuve. The app is mainly targeted to students with preset auditoriums location.
acknowledgment: LLN Maps makes use of the following open source projects:
promptGPSMsg: Switch to location settings in order to enable GPS on your device ?
